name: Lord of the Ocean Slot
description:
Meet the ocean god Poseidon on the reels of this slot game full of secrets and mystery!

Lord of the Ocean™ delivers extraordinary and innovative gaming action paired with excellent chances to win.
Expect beautifully animated gameplay and, with a little luck, thrilling Free Games that feature expanding symbols. Are you ready for a reel adventure?

Lord of the Ocean™ at a glance:
- 5 reels
- Up to 10 win lines
- The magical Gate Scatter symbol
- Chance to trigger 10 Free Games with an expanding symbol

How do I get spinning at Lord of the Ocean™?
It couldn’t be simpler: Get the app, register at GameTwist, and away you go. What’s more, a wide variety of further awesome games is waiting for you at GameTwist!
